MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH2 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Caughall Road, Endsleigh Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:37PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:39PM on 7th February 2021.
